meanings.definition: Resembling or containing butter in taste or texture.
meanings.sent1: The croissant was the butteriest pastry I had ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: Her homemade cookies were always the butteriest in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The butteriest popcorn in the cinema made the movie even better.
meanings.sent4: The butteriest mashed potatoes melted in my mouth like a creamy dream.
meanings.sent5: The butteriest pancakes dripped with golden syrup, tempting everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of buttery, describing something as having the most butter-like qualities.
meanings.sent1: The butteriest cake at the party was a hit with all the guests.
meanings.sent2: The butteriest sauce on the pasta made it rich and flavorful.
meanings.sent3: She joked that the butteriest croissant could probably slide down a hill.
meanings.sent4: The butteriest voice on the radio was soothing and calming.
meanings.sent5: The butteriest sunset painted the sky in shades of gold and pink.
